ing: 2 (6 ounce) jars unseasoned green olives, coarsely chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is an amazing Persian appetizer that can be served as a side dish to a main course or as a dip with pita bread. The origin of this recipe is from North of Iran where there are plenty of olive gardens. Can be stored in the fridge up to a week."
ins:
Mix green olives, olive oil, walnuts, almonds, pomegranate molasses, mint, tarragon, lemon juice, garlic, balsamic vinegar, thyme, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
Chill for at least 3 hours before serving.
